answerText: Color blindness[10] Some types of color blindness are caused by this kind of mutation, in which a single nucleotide is replaced by a different one.

subject: Science
question: Question: The FALANT, or Farnsworth Lantern Test, can diagnose this condition. For 10 points each: [10] Name this condition also diagnosed using Ishihara plates
